name: Lost (itch) (GreenTeam)
description: The story of the game is based on a lost character who has fallen into the world of fantasy. He is forced to fight and survive the difficult challenges that are imposed on him for his survival. Going through a world of fantasy and completely different dimensions, he encounters a lot of inconveniences, but if he survives... he will be stronger! There is unrest here, there are enemies all over the world. His task is to eliminate anyone who gets in his way through this adventure. At the beginning, the character only aims to find a way out of this world, but as time passes and as the character adapts more and more to the new world, his goal changes, he begins to enjoy fantastic scenes, a new way of life and increasingly longs to fight and conquer. Going through the adventure he becomes more and more resilient and stronger for new ventures. After a lot of effort and victory comes the main and strongest enemy and eliminating him we come to the end of the game where he wakes up in his bed. All this was one amazing dream that he will remember for a lifetime.
